content.text:
# During Wartime... Again!

During Wartime... Again! (1999) is the Teno's remix and the 10th anniversary re-release of the SCH's album During Wartime from 1989. The release contains 8 bonus tracks, mostly remixes of the earlier, both previously released and unreleased SCH work.  The record was accompanied by a booklet of the band's most successful lyrics, entitled [https://web.archive.org/web/20090310225737/http://www428.pair.com/skenders/songsandtalesen.html "SCH - Songs & Tales"] (reprinted edition that was first published in 1996 in Prague).
Samir Šestan, in GRAFIT, notes that, in this album, SCH's music is "calmer and less painful" and that During Wartime...Again! offers "a new version of the old, a change that is not real, and it is being done according to the best SCH tradition - fusing political and aesthetic messages.
